task.title: Use the overlay local filesystem
task.shortdesc: In this configuration the SC itself hosts the volume and snapshots for EBS and stores them as files on the local filesystem. It uses standard Linux iSCSI tools to serve the volumes to instances running on NCs.

step.cmd: Configure the SC to use the OverlayManager for storage.
step.info: euca-modify-property -p <partition>.storage.blockstoragemanager=overlay The output of the command should be similar to: PROPERTY PARTI00.storage.blockstoragemanager overlay was <unset>

step.cmd: Verify that the property value is now: 'overlay'

result.p: Your local filesystem (overlay) backend is now ready to use with Eucalyptus.
